data.name: The Leader
data.description: After being exposed to gamma radiation, Samuel Sterns became a hyper-intelligent mastermind who exploits enemy weaknesses and empowers his nefarious allies.

starItems.name: The Leader
starItems.description: After being exposed to gamma radiation, Samuel Sterns became a hyper-intelligent mastermind who exploits enemy weaknesses and empowers his nefarious allies.

1.description: Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist, Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

2.description:
Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

3.description:
Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies
When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.

6.description:
Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> or <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally

7.description:
Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. 

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> or <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> ally.

When this character performs an <color=#9055FF>ISO-8</color> attack, Counterattack, or Assist:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

2.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Call <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> ally that has the highest Damage, that does not have <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>, to attack the primary target and that ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack

3.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> ally that has the highest Damage, that does not have <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>, to attack the primary target. That ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> ally that has the highest Damage, that does not have <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>, to attack the primary target. That ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies, prolong the duration of all positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> and <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

5.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> ally that has the highest Damage, that does not have <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>, to attack the primary target. That ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies, prolong the duration of all positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> and <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

6.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> ally that has the highest Damage, that does not have <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>, to attack the primary target. That ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies, prolong the duration of all positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> and <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies to attack the primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies

7.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

Call <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies that have the highest Damage, that do not have <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>, to attack the primary target. Those allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>GAMMA</color> allies.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies, prolong the duration of all positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> and <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Barrier for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy to all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

1.description:
On Spawn and On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>50</color>, for the following:
 > For each ally with a different Class (<color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color>).
 > For each <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> ally.
 > For each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, instead.

For every <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance, +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage, and +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Block Chance for self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor

2.description:
On Spawn and On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>50</color>, for the following:
 > For each ally with a different Class (<color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color>).
 > For each <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> ally.
 > For each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, instead.

For every <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance, +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage, and +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Block Chance for self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies
When this character or any <color=#fff568>CABAL</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following to that character: 
 > Flip all <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and Barrier for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
